snippet: The leader in handing out nifty stuff at the Detroit auto show is usually Scion, which in the past has offered hats, sunglasses and key chains. This year it had cloth sleeves for your gadgets and a Scion-branded baseball cap.

headline.main: Trinkets and Doodads for Those Who Are Just Looking
